name: admin.conversations.archive
desc: Archive a public or private channel.

errors.already_archived: This channel has already been archived.
errors.channel_not_found: The value passed for `channel` was invalid.
errors.channel_type_not_supported: The value passed for `channel` was an MPDM, DM, or the 'general' channel.
errors.could_not_archive_channel: The provided channel could not be archived.
errors.default_org_wide_channel: The default org-wide channel cannot be archived.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The token provided does not have access to this method.
errors.restricted_action: A workspace preference prevents the authenticated user from archiving this channel.
